name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker gained unauthorized access and executed malicious scripts compromising sensitive data on key servers.

action--0d48eabe-6cd2-47e2-b3f9-49a1f34f.name: Kill malicious script process
action--0d48eabe-6cd2-47e2-b3f9-49a1f34f.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious PowerShell script.

parallel--b58e6315-8c3c-4b67-8414-a67c5e.name: Isolate affected hosts and assess risk
parallel--b58e6315-8c3c-4b67-8414-a67c5e.description: Simultaneously isolate affected hosts and audit logs.

action--b58e6315-8c3c-4b67-8414-a67c5ea1.name: Isolate affected hosts
action--b58e6315-8c3c-4b67-8414-a67c5ea1.description: Block outbound connections for affected hosts to prevent data exfiltration.

commands.command: for host in host-21 host-22 host-23; do ssh $host 'iptables -A OUTPUT -j DROP'; done

action--cd216f6f-e4f9-4455-8c44-75d6eb58.name: Audit script execution logs
action--cd216f6f-e4f9-4455-8c44-75d6eb58.description: Check logs for any malicious script activity.

action--467f33cd-cd3b-44e8-ade4-dc8f097e.name: Conduct system-wide malware scan
action--467f33cd-cd3b-44e8-ade4-dc8f097e.description: Perform a scan for any malware on the system.

while-condition--repeat-until-no-malware.name: Repeat system scan until no malware is found
while-condition--repeat-until-no-malware.description: Continue scanning the system until all malware has been eradicated.
